page.title: 19Entertainment
page.content: Entertainment is found in the Village Hall- meetings,sales,socials,Brownies, snooker,badminton,concerts & plays. Organisations use the Hall,such as the Women's British Legion,the Women's Institute,the Church & Friends of Harpsden School.There is also a Golf Course,a Cricket Ground,& two Playing Fields.There is no pub but there is a Swimming Pool & Indoor Sports Centre on the boundary with Henley. In Henley there is a Cinema & Theatre. There are a lot of inns,pubs,hotels & restaurants.Now ,there are Italian, Indian & German restaurants & a Take- Away,to which there was opposition because of litter.There is a Football Ground,Cricket Ground,Tennis Courts,a Bowling Green,Rowing Clubs & 2 Sports Centres.The River attracts boating enthusiasts,boat hire places & tourists particularly for the Regatta.
